abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau welcomes group of 163 Syrian refugees; Canada's plan to accept thousands of Syrians offers stark contrast to ongoing debate and controversy in United States over whether to restrict number of refugees or ban influx outright.
lead_paragraph: “You are home,” Mr. Trudeau said to 163 refugees after they landed in Toronto, the first of 25,000 the country has promised to take in.

headline.main: Syrian Refugees Greeted by Justin Trudeau in Canada
headline.print_headline: Canada Welcomes New Arrivals From Syria

snippet: “You are home,” Mr. Trudeau said to 163 refugees after they landed in Toronto, the first of 25,000 the country has promised to take in.
